code-runner.executorMap.c: clear; clear; echo 'Running test01...'; make && make test01 > .t.txt && make rtest01 > .r.txt && sed -e '/#.*/d' -re 's/[0-9]{6}//' -e 's/make test//' -e 's/.\/tsh//' .t.txt > .tt.txt && sed -e '/#.*/d' -re 's/[0-9]{6}//' -e 's/make rtest//' -e 's/.\/tshref//' .r.txt > .rr.txt && echo '------------------------------------------------' && diff .tt.txt .rr.txt && echo 'Passed test01!'; ls $dir > /dev/null
